author: parithosh
content:
Is any other EL ready for pectra? If so, you're almost there, then you can use this kurtosis config to check compatibility with nimbus:
```
participants:
  - el_type: nethermind
    el_image: nethermindeth/nethermind:pectra
    cl_type: teku
    cl_image: ethpandaops/teku:master
    count: 3
  - el_type: <YOUR EL NAME HERE>
    el_image: <YOUR EL IMAGE HERE>
    cl_type: teku
    cl_image: ethpandaops/teku:master
network_params:
  electra_fork_epoch: 1
additional_services:
  - dora
  - assertoor
snooper_enabled: true
dora_params:
  env:
    KILLSWITCH_DISABLE_SSZ_REQUESTS: "true"
    KILLSWITCH_DISABLE_SSZ_ENCODING: "true"
assertoor_params:
  run_stability_check: false
  run_block_proposal_check: false
  tests:
    - { file: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ethpandaops/assertoor-test/master/assertoor-tests/pectra-dev/wait-for-slot.yaml", config: { slot: 43 }}
    - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ethpandaops/assertoor-test/master/assertoor-tests/pectra-dev/el-triggered-exit.yaml
    - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ethpandaops/assertoor-test/master/assertoor-tests/pectra-dev/massive-deposit.yaml
```
